company.name: Kan-Guroo
company.description: Kan-Guroo is an international education platform that helps students discover exchange programs and create a successful future.
company.mission: To help young people receive the best education in the world’s leading educational institutions and develop their potential on an international level.
company.vision: We help students become global citizens and gain international experience.

values.innovation: We use modern approaches and technologies to achieve the best results.
values.partnership: We collaborate with leading educational institutions around the world.
values.growth: We help students discover and develop their potential.

school_exchange.name: High School USA
school_exchange.description: 1-year exchange program in U.S. public schools

summer_schools.description: Summer schools in various countries worldwide
